cast.overview: John Anderton is a top 'Precrime' cop in the late-21st century, when technology can predict crimes before they're committed. But Anderton becomes the quarry when another investigator targets him for a murder charge.
cast.title: Minority Report

details.biography:
Dude Walker is an American voice-over talent and actor based in New York City. He is known for his voice-over work and narration in video games, movies, TV shows, and radio.

He narrated the true-crime series Cold Case Files: Dead West, Dead Silent, the reality show Celebrity Watch Party, Space Voyages, The High Court with Doug Benson, and a short titled Dead Harvest. He appeared on House of Cards, The West Wing, and the movie Minority Report.

He has voiced for video games including Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City, Heroes of Newerth as Odin Allfather, Star Wars: The Old Republic as Ardun Kothe and Security Officer Stansun (and additional voices), Star Wars: The Old Republic - Shadow of Revan as Ardun Kothe (and additional voices), and The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind.
details.name: Dude Walker
